text: Au gaa hai o hagadaumee gii bida dadaaligidia hua ginaadou. Digaula ga dadaulia hua i di nadau hagawelewele, ga dadaaligi nia daangada. Nia daangada huogodoo ga iloo ginaadou bolo ma ko Au go Dimaadua, go Tangada dela e haga mouli goodou, gei e haga dagaloaha goodou. Digaula ga iloo ginaadou bolo ma ko Au go di God Koia e Mogobuna o Israel.”
